edu.northwestern.at.morphadorner
Interface MorphAdornerXMLWriter

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultMorphAdornerXMLWriter
public interface MorphAdornerXMLWriter

Interface for writing an adorned XML file with added ID fields.

Method Summary

              throws java.io.IOException,
                     org.xml.sax.SAXException
Write XML output.

Parameters:
inFile - The XML input file.
outFile - The XML output file.
maxID - The maximum ID value in the input file.
posTags - The part of speech tags.
splitWords - The map of (word ID, # of word parts) for multipart words.
totalWords - Total words.
totalPageBreaks - Total page breaks.

IOException, - SAXException
